  • Exhibitions

Since its inception the club has regularly exhibited its layouts at various displays and exhibitions and has conducted an annual exhibition since 1978.

Our 2010 exhibition is approaching, and will be on Queenâ€™s Birthday weekend, 12th to 14th June 2010.

The address is:

Brandon Park Community Centre
645 Ferntree Gully Road
Glen Waverley.

We will have ten layouts, some demonstrations, eight trade stands and a canteen.

Ticket prices will be up shortly.

Previous exhibitions

Our 2009 exhibition was our third year at the Brandon Park Community Centre, which is opposite Brandon Park shops and near the corner of Ferntree Gully and Springvale roads. We had a wide variety of exhibitors attending, ranging from “U-Drive” activities for the kids through to hand crafted, period scale layouts. We also had a number of trade stands, including Branchline and Brunel Models.

Our exhibitions have traditionally been run during the Queen’s Birthday long weekend, which this year was Saturday 7th to Monday 9th of June.

2009 Exhibition Gallery

Photos from our 2009 exhibition will be available shortly.
